long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flow Translator is a powerful extension designed to provide you with fast and efficient translation. With a pre-set list of languages, it allows you to quickly translate selected text with just a few clicks. The extension is perfect for users who need quick translations without having to manually adjust settings or search for translation tools. Whether you're working across multiple languages or need to translate on the go, Flow Translator makes the process seamless and easy.
